item.title:
RT by @thewiremagazine: To mark The Wire's 40th birthday, this week we are offering 40% off an annual digital subscription to the magazine. Buy for yourself or give as a gift. Enter code WIRE40 at the check out. Valid till midnight UK time Sun 3 July.
Read more + purchase here: http://shop.exacteditions.com/the-wire
item.dc:creator: @thewiremagazine
item.description:

item.title: RT by @thewiremagazine: ‚ÄúSavage Republic were a highly intelligent, politically aware punk rock force, simultaneously shouldering their way into areas that such avant garde players as Glenn Branca and Rhys Chatham were also exploring‚Äù. Thanks to @thewiremagazine for this great review of Tragic Figures!

item.title: RT by @thewiremagazine: had Wire subs on and off for many years, this is a good deal though and just got again. It's good to support. As a bonus, I can also search the archive to check I've still never ever been mentioned in TW. ü•∫ yet üòà

item.title:
Open access to The Wire's online library ends at midnight tonight ‚Äì don't miss your last chance to explore the entire archive for free! Here's the link: http://bit.ly/3y6TlLA
Plus, scroll through our feed for some suggested reading relating to our upcoming Wire 40 events.
item.dc:creator: @thewiremagazine
